channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath blocked by electric fence, 28th March
item.description:
Where footpath leaves corner of field. The footpath is also blocked by a different electric fence SW of this position (already reported by another user).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I’ve reported this issue with an unacceptable response., 28th March
item.description:
I have put the Gloucestershire highways on notice about this and been told nothing will be done. Should my car obtain damage from this collection of potholes this is clear evidence of negligence on the Gloucester highways and I will be seeking full compensation for repair to my car. There neglect has already damanged my car with another pothole that they managed to get out of paying but I now how this proof.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 28th March

Report on FixMyStreet
